member.name: T:Fusion.FilteringLogStream
member.summary: A proxy log streams that allows for filtering messages. Note that filtering is applied after the message is formatted, so it is really mostly suitable for Unit tests.

member.name: M:Fusion.FilteringLogStream.#ctor(System.String,Fusion.LogStream)
member.param: If a message contains this, it will not be logged
The actual log stream that will consume filtered messages

member.name: T:Fusion.FusionEditorLog
member.summary: A logger that writes logs to the Unity console with the purpose of being used in the Unity Editor.

member.summary: Logs a message to the Unity console if FUSION_EDITOR_TRACE is defined. Use in the Config context.

member.summary: Provides methods for asserting conditions. Throws an AssertException when a condition is not met. Methods are only invoked in DEBUG builds unless otherwise specified.

member.name: T:Fusion.Log
member.summary:
Global logging class. Needs to be initialized before use. When in Unity, "FusionLogInitializer" takes care of that. All static methods have conditional compilation directives:
FUSION_LOGLEVEL_DEBUG enables "Debug" methods
FUSION_LOGLEVEL_INFO enables all the above and Info methods
FUSION_LOGLEVEL_WARN enables all the above and Warn methods
FUSION_LOGLEVEL_ERROR enables all the above and Error methods
Trace channels are enabled separately with FUSION_TRACE_* directives.

member.name: M:Fusion.Log.Dispose
member.summary: Uninitializes the logger. All log streams are disposed.

member.name: T:Fusion.Log.CreateLogStreamDelegate
member.summary: A delegate to create a log stream.

member.name: P:Fusion.Log.IsInitialized
member.summary: Whether the logger is initialized.

member.name: P:Fusion.Log.Settings
member.summary: Current log settings.

member.name: M:Fusion.Log.Initialize(Fusion.LogLevel,Fusion.Log.CreateLogStreamDelegate,Fusion.TraceChannels)
member.summary: Initializes the logger with the specified log level and trace channels.
member.param: The minimal log level. All messages with lower level are not going to be reported, regardless of FUSION_LOGLEVEL defines.
Trace channels to activate. Trace channels not included will not get reported, regardless of FUSION_TRACE defines.

member.name: M:Fusion.Log.InitializeForConsole(Fusion.LogSettings)
member.summary: Initializes the logger to log to the console.

member.name: M:Fusion.Log.InitializeForConsole(Fusion.LogLevel,Fusion.TraceChannels)
member.summary: Initializes the logger to log to the console.
